Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2017 10:36PM Janney03 wrote: I was tired and had burning pain in my breasts before my diagnosis. Although my tumor was very small 6 mm (Invasive Tubular Breast Cancer) it caused a lot if havoc in my body. I had lumpectomy surgery 3 weeks ago and the fatigue is worse and I haven't even went for radiation yet.
Posts.Title: Anyone have problems with fatigue prior to diagnosis? cfdr dlj140
